name: DogFight (itch) (Musa Odabaşı)
description:
Made By Musa Odabaşı

Controls are written in main menu.

%5-10 of Graphics is free asset(Menu wallpaper, Explosion and gun hit effect)

Defend the base and eliminate the air and land enemies. if fight is over and land permission is granted, press space for open the wheels and land for finish the mission.

Collect cargoes so you don't run out of fuel.

Flare is good for defending against bullets.
